title: Airplane Model
description: Concept single-engine light aircraft model — interactive 3D viewer and renders.
longDescription: WIP — Detailed description to be added (design intent, constraints, mating strategy, mass properties, and manufacturing considerations).

title: Antonov AN-10 — Surfaces-001
description: Surface-model practice: AN-10 transport aircraft — clean topology and renders.
longDescription: First pass at the Antonov AN-10 using a surface-driven workflow (lofted skins, guide curves, and continuity checks).

title: Fifth Mill Practice
description: CNC mill practice — three operations, roughing/finishing toolpaths; videos + 3D model viewer.
longDescription: Facing, pocketing, and contour operations with updated feeds/speeds. Includes three run clips and a web-viewable GLB of the part.

title: First Lathe Project
description: Intro lathe practice — basic turning ops with single video and 3D model viewer.
longDescription: Starter turning exercise covering facing, turning, and cutoff. One short demonstration video and a lightweight GLB for interactive viewing.
